subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: Horses trained by Bill Mott will be trying to capture the Ladies’ Classic and the Classic at the Breeders’ Cup at Santa Anita.
snippet: Horses trained by Bill Mott will be trying to capture the Ladies’ Classic and the Classic at the Breeders’ Cup at Santa Anita.
